alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 10:54PM CST until February 15 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CST FOR EASTERN BENTON...NORTHWESTERN MADISON...WESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1054 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Washburn to 5 miles southwest of Garfield to 4 miles northwest of Farmington, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Highfill... Gateway... Beaver... Hindsville... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
